articles.title: Last Week, 1 In 3 U.S. COVID Cases Were In Florida And Texas - NPR
articles.description: In the last week, 3 million Americans got their first vaccine shot. On Tuesday, the U.S. hit President Biden's July Fourth goal of 70% of adults receiving at least one shot.
articles.content:
